Namespace Innova.Prism.Telerik.Expressions

Classes

Name Summary
CompositeFilterDescriptor

Represents a filtering descriptor which serves as a container for one or more child filtering descriptors.
CompositeFilterDescriptorCollection

Represents collection of Telerik.Windows.Data.IFilterDescriptor object composed together by a logical operator.
DescriptorBase

Base class for all descriptors used for handling the logic for property changed notifications.
ExpressionBuilderBase

Base class for expression builders.
ExpressionBuilderOptions
FilterDescriptorBase

Base class for all Telerik.Windows.Data.IFilterDescriptor used for handling the logic for property changed notifications.
FilterDescriptorCollectionExpressionBuilder

Represents a builder for creating filter expression from a collection of filter descriptors.
FilterExpressionBuilder

Represents an abstract base class for building filter expressions.
